description.en:
1-3. Shining Days
The strong-willed Asahi and the easy-going Tetsuro have been close friends since kids. Now in high school, those two still “share” their bento. However, Asahi is asked to stop bullying Tetsuro, “because he’s too nice to tell you his true feelings!” But is that really how Tetsuro feels about Asahi’s bullying—?

4. Fireworks
Morio invite Saeki to the local fireworks festival but receives the usual cold response from Saeki. Follows Morio and Saeki-sensei from Vanilla.

5. Anniversary
Nakajima is unsure about his relationship status with Yajima, They have been going out for weeks but nothing physical has yet to happen between them. Follows Nakajima and Yajima from Vanilla.

6) Lost Pain
Nakajima is unsure of Yajima's love for him despite the constant declarations of love. The problem? Nakajima finds it hard to take Yajima seriously when all he can see is his poker face. Follows Nakajima and Yajima from Vanilla.

7. The Prince's Secret
The prince admits his past history to his lover, hoping he will display some signs of jealousy. The sequel to Hashire! Oujisama. Scanlated by Obsession as DJ for Hashire! Oujisama.

8. The Standard Equation of Love
A friend confesses to stealing his girlfriend to his childhood playmate, hoping to get a rise out of him.
